name: Mad Mechs (SooD)
description:
Please see the controls below.

An AI has gone out of control! It has deployed factories everywhere that make killer Mechs! We've managed to hack one, but not very well. You may loose control of some functionalities, but it's all we got. Save us!

A top down shooter where you control a faulty mech that looses control of some of its functions every now and then. Use it to stop the crazy AI's mech factories!

Our submission for 48 hour GMTK Jam 2020 in the theme of "Out of Control"

Controls: 

  • WSAD to move
  • Left click and Right Click for weapon attacks
  • Shift to dash
